content: Hey, I got orders saying that I'm reassigned to the 90th RRC. I live in VA and the unit is stationed in Arkansas. Do you know any contact info, like human resource staff telephone numbers, so that I may know what I need to do?

content: we do not know what your MOS is or why you are being reassigned but talk to your units admin specialist... he'll have the answers you need. One Flag......One Heart......One Nation............EVERMORE

content: darlin va - good luck! The RRC's have downsized as the Expeditionary Sustainment Command's have taken over the actual troops. I am in the same building with the remaining 99th RSC (before they all leave for Ft. Dix). I've only driven through Arkansas (sorry).
